job_title: Anonymous Employee in New Concord, OH
pros: Working with students, small-town atmosphere, beautiful campus
cons: Very clique-ish. Even though they say they want an inclusive campus for both staff and students part-time employees are treated like they do not matter and do not exist, and there is no opportunity to move to full time. Students who come from wealthier families are given preferential treatment. Pay is very low for the work you are expected to do and they are very disrespectful if you do not agree with every policy or idea those in charge have. Employees are told what they can say and who they can talk to.

pros: Location nice campus with new and old buildings but small. Small very small percentage of diverse people employed iat university so for folks who do not appreciate diversity this is your place.
cons: Very clickish and small town mentality, no room for diversity.  World view very limited and narrow.

pros: Great place to work for. Great people and great management.
